summary: I have tweaked Uthgerd the Unbroken, who is located in the Bannered Mare of Whiterun, to be somewhat more beautiful in my opinion. This mod requires Apachii Sky Hair.
descriptionHtml:
I have tweaked Uthgerd the Unbroken, who is located in the Bannered Mare of Whiterun, to be somewhat more beautiful in my opinion. This mod requires Apachii Sky Hair, which can be found here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/?

Created using Skyrim NPC Editor, which can be found here:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4554/?
Please leave an endorsement if you like this mod.

NOTE: I use the No More Blocky Faces mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30/?
and Better Females by Bella: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812/?
Using these two mods will get you the look she has in the picture.
author: agemo4
